item.title: By: LadyGuardian
item.dc:creator: LadyGuardian
item.description: Amen to the headset removal during vent mooing. Also, here are some <a href="http://www.gucomics.com/archives/view.php?cdate=20060207" rel="nofollow">other solid tips</a>.
item.content:encoded: Amen to the headset removal during vent mooing. Also, here are some other solid tips.

item.title: By: Hyd
item.dc:creator: Hyd
item.description: The cool thing was the cows' moos, which must've been done by the developers themselves. They were fairly deadpan voices, different ones for different cows, all saying (not imitating a cow, mind you) "moo".
item.content:encoded: The cool thing was the cows’ moos, which must’ve been done by the developers themselves. They were fairly deadpan voices, different ones for different cows, all saying (not imitating a cow, mind you) “moo”.

item.title: By: jiffy
item.dc:creator: jiffy
item.description:
Rofl.
I've seen that tip too. I love Blizzard's sense of humor. Nothing quite beats it. :)
item.content:encoded:
Rofl.

I’ve seen that tip too. I love Blizzard’s sense of humor. Nothing quite beats it. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: roXet
item.dc:creator: roXet
item.description: I still find it hilarious at the amount of time people actually spent trying to find the cow level in Diablo 1. I will admit I did molest the hell out of those poor cows a few times, but I eventually decided it was a hoax. Gotta wonder who started that...
item.content:encoded: I still find it hilarious at the amount of time people actually spent trying to find the cow level in Diablo 1. I will admit I did molest the hell out of those poor cows a few times, but I eventually decided it was a hoax. Gotta wonder who started that…

item.title: By: Vargen
item.dc:creator: Vargen
item.description: That screen keeps saying there is no Cow Level, but every time I go to Thunder Bluff it's still there.
item.content:encoded: That screen keeps saying there is no Cow Level, but every time I go to Thunder Bluff it’s still there.
